name: Dreamcatcher (Sweet_Salt)
description:
our first game jam! we had a lot of fun making it and we hope you will have fun too!

Controls:

- WAD or Arrows for movement.

-R for reset and M to mute the music.

-SPACE for jump.

you can skip the last levels due to their hard difficulty, just press i (I).

 d'ont skip the last photo! :D
